text:
There. He. Is. Kenya Moore's camera-shy and "no nonsense" husband, Marc Daly, surprised everyone when he popped up on The Real Housewives of Atlanta during Sunday's episode to support his wife (clip above). And the crew was definitely surprised to see him make an appearance, as you can see in the clip above.

One of those surprised people was NeNe Leakes, who is offering up her advice on how to make a marriage work to the newlyweds. She revealed all to The Daily Dish earlier this season.

"You know, I've been with the same guy [Gregg Leakes] for over 20 years, so my best advice I can give to any couple is communication is definitely key and to always be yourself in your relationship," she said. "It's very difficult to be IN a relationship with somebody and pretend to be someone else. You have to be yourself. You have to be comfortable with who you are."

It's a formula that definitely works, if you ask her. "All of those things play a part in being together for 20 and 30 years down the road," she said. "But communication is at the very top of the list."

To learn a bit more about Marc from Kandi Burruss, press play on the video below.
title: NeNe Leakes Has the Perfect and Most Sincere Marriage Advice for Kenya Moore and Marc Daly
